pr_title: Fix incorrect column mapping in Kudu connector

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add a tests where incorrect column mapping was exposed?
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: AbstractTestQuery#testCorrelatedJoin, testTableSampleWithFiltering, testSelectAllFromOuterScopeTable exposes this incorrect table mapping. TestKuduDistributedQueries  captures most of the cases where incorrect column mapping was exposed
replies.author: Praveen2112

timeline.bodyText: this comment is not needed, the code below is self explanatory
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.message: Fix incorrect column mapping in KuduRecordCursor
